1.content: Create project structure and setup files
1.details: Set up the complete project directory structure with configuration files, requirements.txt, setup scripts, and base infrastructure

2.details: Create complete implementation with model loading, inference pipeline, real-time detection, and soccer-specific classes (players, goalkeepers, referees, ball)

3.content: Implement SAM2 video segmentation and tracking
3.details: Build video segmentation pipeline with frame-by-frame tracking, occlusion handling, and player movement analysis

4.details: Create multimodal player identification system with zero-shot classification, similarity search, and player clustering capabilities

5.details: Build ResNet backbone implementation for player detection, classification, and identification with jersey number recognition

6.details: Build unified framework that can run all models, switch between approaches, and combine outputs for comprehensive recognition

7.details: Build working demo applications showing each model in action, with sample videos and practical usage examples

8.details: Generate complete technical documentation, API references, usage tutorials, and troubleshooting guides
